titleStmt.title: An Electronic Edition of Mishnah Bava Metsia Ch. 2, Parma De Rossi 138 A
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Department of History and Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhof Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a .

note.p: Tractate Neziqin (Bavot) from the Biblioteca Palatina 3173 (De Rossi 138).
Transcription by Jonthan Margulies and Nurit Ezer
This transcription supercedes Camb.xml, transcribed and marked up by Justin Orr

handNote.note: "About half of the tractates are supplied with vowel points reflecting the vocalization accrding to the Babylonian tradition" (Richler)
Folios 175-195. Scribe thought to be identical with scribe of MS Vat., Biblioteca Apostolica ebr. 31 (Sifra), dated 1072-1073

ab.label: ז׳
ab.w: חייב Deletion is implied. Photo quality does not allow verification of whether there are strikethrough or other erasure marks present. פטורמכולם

ab.label: י׳
ab.w: לשנה Two methods of noting deletion here.

ab.label: ג׳
ab.w: הבית Apparently two sets of deletion marks: colons on either side, and strikethrough.
צריך Apparently two sets of deletion marks: colons on either side, and strike marks above the letters.

ab.label: ה׳
ab.w: נוטל Apparently two sets of deletion marks: colons on either side, and strike marks above the letters.
ab.label: ו׳
ז׳
